title: How can we make music for free? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey Buddy! To Make all type of music like drum, piano, karaoke, song recording and editing I would Suggest you “Band Lab“ Application which Includes All Musical features… Link of App - BandLab – Music Studio & Social Network - Apps on Google Play Thanks… Follow Me on Quora - Ramakant Kumar Have a Nice Day... 🤗🤗🤗
